channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Disgraced ex-Congressman Weiner receives campaign donation from unexpected New Yorker in new race

item.title: Mercedes-Benz CEO pushes for zero tariffs as Trump embarks on EU auto trade war
item.description: Mercedes urges the EU and U.S. to abolish car tariffs as Trump threatens new duties, warning that trade barriers could stifle growth.

item.title: The Chief Justice Needs To Stop Taking PR Cues From Meghan Markle

item.title: We Must Restore the U.S. Agency for Global Media, Not Eliminate It
